# itemSearchBlock

**Instance Property**

The block for retrieving the next or previous rotor.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemSearchBlock: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search { get set }
```

## Discussion

Your implementation of the block facilitates navigation from the current rotor to the next or previous rotor.

## Navigating to the next item

- **UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search**: The block type for retrieving the next or previous rotor.
- **UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Direction**: Constants that indicate the search direction.
